content: To obtain the Deathstinger, you need to defeat The Scorpionlord (the boss) in the secret Purple Cloud Mountain area in The Webbed Hollow. Our video guide below will take you through how to unlock it:

The content is as follows:
To obtain the Deathstinger, you need to defeat The Scorpionlord (the boss) in the secret Purple Cloud Mountain area in The Webbed Hollow. Our video guide below will take you through how to unlock it:
